name: Mega Guns
description:
((INTRO))
-MEGA GUNS is an endless-defense game in which you have to destroy as many enemies as you can.

((RULES))
-You have to stop enemies from hitting you OR crossing the finish line.
-You might find other guns inside the "secret box" that pops up every once in a while, just hit the box or shoot at it to get the new gun.
-There are 4 enemy types, and 5 gun types.

((CONTROLS))
(Movement)
-(Move left) = Button (A) OR Button (Left Arrow).
-(Move Right) = Button (D) OR Button (Right Arrow).

(Shooting)
-(Shoot) = Button (W) OR Button (Up Arrow).
